FuncDef:
The remote-backup-profile command configures a remote backup profile.
The undo remote-backup-profile command deletes a remote backup profile.
By default, no remote backup profile is configured for an IPsec instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a remote backup profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In dual-system hot backup scenarios, to configure a remote backup profile, run the remote-backup-profile command.
Precautions
After an IPsec instance is applied to an IPsec policy, the remote backup profile cannot be modified.
